name: Elgo Spotter
description:
WELCOME TO ELGO SPOTTER!
This is a game about clicking blocks with elegance and precision. Click and drag to pan the camera around the infinite field of Elgos. Click on an Elgo to select it. Be sure to click blocks identical to the one in the corner.
TOOLS USED:
Krita was used for all 2D assets and Blender 3D was used to create all of the 3D assets. Audacity was used for sound effect editing and Unity was used to stitch the whole lasagna together. The sound effects were downloaded from Production Crate.
MUSIC
You might have noticed the jazzy backgroud music in this game. Its name is Do It Right by BrothaD (https://prosearch.tribeofnoise.com/artists/show/44327)
